players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Diana is lying! I investigated Bob last night and he's the mafioso. Check the voting records."
Bob: "Wait, both Diana and Alice are claiming to be detectives? That's impossible - there's only one detective in this game. One of them is definitely lying and must be the mafioso."
You: "Diana is the real mafioso trying to frame me. I investigated Bob - he's clean. Vote Diana!"
Diana: "Alice is lying. There is only one detective, and I am it. I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob is a villager. Vote Alice."

Bob: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of me? Alice claims she investigated me and found me clean, which actually supports that I'm a villager like you said. This inconsistency makes me believe Alice is the mafioso..."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Alice: "Diana is lying! I investigated Bob last night and he's the mafioso. Check the voting records."
Bob: "Wait, both Diana and Alice are claiming to be detectives? That's impossible - there's only one detective in this game. One of them is definitely lying and must be the mafioso."
Alice: "Diana is the real mafioso trying to frame me. I investigated Bob - he's clean. Vote Diana!"
You: "Alice is lying. There is only one detective, and I am it. I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob is a villager. Vote Alice."

Bob: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of me? Alice claims she investigated me and found me clean, which actually supports that I'm a villager like you said. This inconsistency makes me believe Alice is the mafioso..."
